name: Ronin's Run
description:
A side scrolling 3D Beat 'em Up with inspiration from classic arcade games. It is set in Feudal Japan and you play as Ronin whose village has been invaded by brigands and have set out to avenge the death of your master. 


Development Status

The game is still in alpha. The current build is a small gameplay only demo that includes 2 early game levels. 

Follow for more updates: https://twitter.com/roninsrungame

Discord: https://discord.gg/JssYgrn3


Notes

The game has been built for 16:9/16:10 screen resolutions so even on a widescreen monitor you will be limited to these specific aspect ratios.


Known Issues

- Dash can sometimes cause inputs to get stuck. Jumping will usually fix the issue.

- Health pickups can bug out

- Gamepad icons not showing for some controllers

Input

The game supports Keyboard + Mouse and gamepad controllers. See below for attack/ability list


Attacks and Abilities

Here is a list of all the attacks/abilities in the game. See in game key bindings for relevant input type (keyboard/gamepad)

NOTE: For the current demo version these are all unlocked from the start

Light

Heavy Attack
Heavy
